title: Alan Lightman on Science, Spirituality, and Searching for Stars on an Island in Maine
description: Author and Physicist Alan Lightman talks about his book Searching for Stars on an Island in Maine with EconTalk host Russ Roberts. This is a wide-ranging conversation on religion, science, transcendence, consciousness, impermanence, and whether matter is all that matters.
author: webmaster@econlib.org (Library of Economics and Liberty)
